label: Decentralized Identifier
Description1: Standard for creating decentralized identifiers owned and controlled by people (or organizations) not a centralized authority.
Community Info: I'll pass. They look like most tech communities. Really male and white with a weird fetish for wanting to help refugees while ignoring the one woman of color who showed up once. Yeah. There is lots of work to do on white & male  privilege here and like everywhere else. mostly they are entirely unconscious of it.
Suggested Values: a high functioning standards organization growing out of long standing community effort around these ideas centered around the Internet Identity Workshop and an offshoot Rebooting Web of Trust
description:
#
##About Decentralized Identifier
![About Decentralized Identifier]()
 ###Standard for creating decentralized identifiers owned and controlled by people (or organizations) not a centralized authority.
